docs.snippet: With little cash to spend in free agency, the Knicks went bargain hunting and found a nice way to cheaply bolster their backcourt in Beno Udrih, a nine-year N.B.A. veteran....
docs.lead_paragraph: With little cash to spend in free agency, the Knicks went bargain hunting and found a nice way to cheaply bolster their backcourt in Beno Udrih, a nine-year N.B.A. veteran.
docs.abstract: Off The Dribble blog; New York Knicks quietly add to their hectic off-season by signing guard Beno Udrih, nine-year NBA veteran, to a one-year contract.
